root.title: 9 Bichiktoo-Bum VII
root.place: The inscription is placed north-east of Bichiktoo-Bum III at foot of mountain’s south slope.
root.description: The line is vertical and consists of 11-12 signs.
root.size: Length of line 17,8 cm, height of signs 2,5-3 cm.
root.investigation: Jamaeva found in 1996. Kyzlasov, Nevskaya, Tybykova investigated in 2003-2005 on found place. Publications Kocheev 523.

pdf.f_title: Свод древнетюркских рунических памятников Горного Алтая. Горно-Алтайск: АКИН, 2006. – 52 с.

refs.ref: Кызласов И.Л. Рунические письменности евразийских степей.-М. 1994.-С. 318.-Рис. 18.
